file_insights.changes: Status tracking file updated to reflect completion of subtask-4-2

patterns_discovered.description: System maintains JSON status file to track project progress across sessions
patterns_discovered.evidence: Completed count incremented automatically upon subtask completion

patterns_discovered.description: Each session is numbered and timestamped for audit trail purposes
patterns_discovered.evidence: Session 6 progressed to session 7, started_at timestamp preserved, last_update timestamp modified

patterns_discovered.description: Linear progression through subtasks with one task in progress at a time
patterns_discovered.evidence: 6 completed out of 7 total, 1 in_progress, 0 failed - demonstrates single-threaded task execution

gotchas_discovered.description: Only status file was modified despite 'End-to-end verification of transition system' completion - actual verification code/tests may exist elsewhere or verification was metadata-only
gotchas_discovered.implication: Ensure verification implementation is tracked in appropriate files

gotchas_discovered.description: Microsecond precision in timestamps could create timezone/synchronization issues if system operates across time zones
gotchas_discovered.implication: Consider standardizing to UTC timezone in timestamps

approach_outcome.summary: Subtask-4-2 (End-to-end verification of transition system) was completed successfully
completion_evidence: Completed subtask count incremented from 5 to 6

recommendations.recommendation: Document what 'end-to-end verification' entailed in commit message or separate test file for future reference
Consider adding failure_reason field to status file to capture context when subtasks fail (currently unused)
